modules.name: Data Foundations
modules.description: This module establishes a strong understanding of core data concepts, including data types, structures, and fundamental principles of data analysis.
aims: Define and differentiate between various data types.
Explain key data structures and their applications.
Describe the essential principles of data integrity and quality.
Identify common data analysis methods and their purposes.

modules.name: Python for Data Science
modules.description: Master the fundamentals of Python programming with a focus on libraries and tools essential for data science tasks.
aims: Write basic Python code and understand control flow structures.
Utilize essential Python libraries like NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib.
Perform data manipulation, cleaning, and analysis using Python.
Visualize data effectively using Python graphing libraries.

modules.name: SQL for Data Management
modules.description: Learn the intricacies of SQL to query, manipulate, and manage data stored in relational databases.
aims: Write basic SQL queries to retrieve, filter, and aggregate data.
Understand database schema design and normalization principles.
Perform data manipulation tasks using SQL UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements.
Optimize SQL queries for performance and efficiency.

modules.name: Data Wrangling and Exploration
modules.description: Develop skills in preparing and exploring data for analysis, including cleaning, transforming, and summarizing.
aims: Implement data cleaning techniques to handle missing values and inconsistencies.
Transform data into desired formats for analysis.
Summarize and explore data using descriptive statistics and visualizations.
Identify patterns and trends within datasets.

modules.name: Data Modeling and Visualization
modules.description: Learn techniques for building data models and effectively visualizing insights.
aims: Design and implement data models using appropriate techniques.
Utilize data visualization tools to communicate findings effectively.
Create interactive dashboards and reports to present data insights.
Develop a strong understanding of visual storytelling principles.

modules.name: Machine Learning Fundamentals
modules.description: Gain a foundational understanding of machine learning concepts, algorithms, and applications.
aims: Define key machine learning concepts such as supervised and unsupervised learning.
Understand common machine learning algorithms and their applications.
Apply basic machine learning models to real-world data.
Evaluate the performance of machine learning models.

modules.name: Big Data Technologies
modules.description: Explore the world of big data technologies, including Hadoop, Spark, and cloud-based data platforms.
aims: Understand the architecture and capabilities of Hadoop.
Learn to process and analyze large datasets using Spark.
Explore cloud-based data platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud.
Implement big data solutions for real-world problems.

modules.name: Data Ethics and Privacy
modules.description: Develop a responsible approach to data science by understanding ethical considerations and privacy regulations.
aims: Identify ethical dilemmas in data science applications.
Understand data privacy regulations and best practices.
Advocate for responsible and ethical use of data.
Promote data literacy and awareness among stakeholders.

modules.name: Data Storytelling and Communication
modules.description: Learn to effectively communicate data insights through compelling narratives and visualizations.
aims: Structure data-driven stories that engage audiences.
Tailor communication style to different audiences.
Create impactful presentations and reports.
Develop strong data visualization skills for storytelling.
